txt.en: Flight to the Lonely Mountain -- Tier 1
The people of Dale are attempting to flee to the safety of the Lonely Mountain. The Easterling army is not far behind...
The Easterlings have been driven off. The clearing is held. The people of Dale will make it to the Lonely Mountain.
Defeat the Easterlings in the clearing
The people of Dale are attempting to flee to the safety of the Lonely Mountain. The Easterling army is not far behind...
Defend the clearing from the Easterling assault
